name: Kōrōmu Auto Battler⭐202020
description:
An auto-chess game featuring a futuristic retelling of the classic love story of KŌRŌMU ('紅楼夢'), inspired by Unreal characters.

A teenage girl is suddenly summoned to an unfamiliar cosmos, where she finds herself reincarnated as an orphan princess with super powers. She fights her way across 12 constellations of the Galaxy Empire, and finally make it to the Imperial Capitol, where a well-planned coup awaits her...
